title: Pixel 2 stuck in boot-up page, and I can't even start safe mode
content:
My Pixel 2 is stuck in the boot up page (G logo with the progress bar below it).

It just stays on this page until the battery is drained. It does not continuously restart.

I managed to access the fastboot and recovery modes, and did a restart from there, but the problem still persists.

I also tried to start the phone in safe mode by holding the volume down button during boot up, but nothing happened.

Is a factory reset my only option at this point?

Can I copy my files using recovery mode?

It's a shame that Nexus and Pixel phones have had these issues...

Please help.
